com.akvelon.server.service.api

Interface ProductService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service<java.lang.Integer,Product>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProductServiceImpl

    public interface ProductService
extends Service<java.lang.Integer,Product>
    Standard services operations with Product objects through ProductDAO objects. The user of this interface can create, read, update, delete domain objects from the database through ProductDAO objects.
    See Also:
    Service

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Product> getTopFive()
      Read TOP FIVE bikes from the database through ProductDAO objects.
      java.util.List<Product> searchProduct(java.lang.String searchRequest)
      Reads Product objects from a database through ProductDAO objects, whose name contains a searchRequest.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.akvelon.server.service.api.Service

        create, delete, getAll, getRepository, read, readAllBy, readBy, update

    • Method Detail

      • getTopFive

        java.util.List<Product> getTopFive()
        Read TOP FIVE bikes from the database through ProductDAO objects. Top five bikes: five bikes for which the largest transaction is registered with type S(Sales).
        Returns:
        read Product values in the List format.

      • searchProduct

        java.util.List<Product> searchProduct(java.lang.String searchRequest)
        Reads Product objects from a database through ProductDAO objects, whose name contains a searchRequest.
        Parameters:
        searchRequest - search request string.
        Returns:
        read Product values in the List format.
